archiefmat.titel: Register van uitgaande brieven van de gouverneur van Curaçao en onderhorige eilanden aan het Departement van Koloniën
archiefmat.titel_eng: Register of letters of the Governor of Curaçao and its dependencies sent to the Department of the Colonies
archiefmat.notes:
Period: 17 November 1820 - 28 November 1827

 

In the first volume (no. 2) a list of years and numbers of letters is included with the remark that copies were made from the General Secretary's office of Curaçao on behalf of Governor P.R. Cantz'laar. All copies were made after 20 May 1828, the day that Cantz'laar assumed office.
